scenes.text: Five hundred AI articles are published every single day. You read three. Maybe four on a good day.
Hacker News. Reddit. ArXiv. TechCrunch. Dozens of RSS feeds. Scattered across tabs, buried in bookmarks. The noise is overwhelming. The signal? Lost.
Meet Data Cube AI. Your daily AI intelligence briefing, curated by AI, delivered in seconds.
Every morning, twenty-two sources are scanned. The most impactful breakthroughs surface to the top. Impact-rated, summarized, and ready to read.
Track AI funding rounds, IPOs, and M and A deals. Real-time stock data. Primary and secondary market intelligence at a glance.
Practical tips from fourteen Reddit communities. Actionable prompts, tools, and workflows. Rated by difficulty.
Ask the AI assistant anything about your weekly briefing. Or generate a full executive report with one click. Export to Word, HTML, or Markdown.
Twenty-two sources. Fourteen Reddit communities. Two languages. Updated daily. All completely free.
Your daily AI news, curated by AI. Start reading at datacubeai.space. No signup required.
Data Cube AI. Open source. MIT licensed.
